job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Medior Front End Developer, you will be pivotal in advancing our learning platform, collaborating closely with our UX researcher, as well as your fellow developers. We're looking for individuals with a thirst for innovation, a hands-on mindset and a desire to create a positive transformative impact on education.

   Sounds nice, but what are you doing here as a Front End Developer?
   Working with a modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend, Fully automated devops)
   Apart from the obvious (iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing) you will be working on large scale projects, new features as well as internal tooling.
   Collaborating closely with our CX team, to create well crafted experiences for our users.
   Using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge. Some examples are using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)
   Take an active role in our Agile process
   Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members
   Active participation in shaping the future of development within Faqta by brainstorming with the CTO and CPO on technical directions and implementations.
job_details.full_text:
Frontend Developer

As a Medior Front End Developer, you will be pivotal in advancing our learning platform, collaborating closely with our UX researcher, as well as your fellow developers. We're looking for individuals with a thirst for innovation, a hands-on mindset and a desire to create a positive transformative impact on education.

   Sounds nice, but what are you doing here as a Front End Developer?
   Working with a modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend, Fully automated devops)
   Apart from the obvious (iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing) you will be working on large scale projects, new features as well as internal tooling.
   Collaborating closely with our CX team, to create well crafted experiences for our users.
   Using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge. Some examples are using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)
   Take an active role in our Agile process
   Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members
   Active participation in shaping the future of development within Faqta by brainstorming with the CTO and CPO on technical directions and implementations.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is for a Front End Developer and primarily focuses on traditional software development tasks using a modern web stack (Vite, React, SCSS, Node.JS). While it mentions using AI to enhance work and knowledge, it does not involve the core responsibilities of building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, nor does it focus on data engineering or advanced modeling techniques. The role is more about leveraging AI tools for productivity rather than developing AI systems themselves, fitting the 'Ambiguous' profile as it's not a technical AI role.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Frontend Developer', 'modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend', 'iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing', 'large scale projects, new features', and 'internal tooling', all of which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Working with a modern stack (Vite + React + SCSS) frontend, Node.JS backend, Fully automated devops)

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing' directly refers to common software development maintenance and enhancement tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: iterative improvements, small features and bugfixing

job_tasks.justification: Working on 'large scale projects, new features' is a fundamental aspect of software development.
Developing 'internal tooling' is a common software development task to improve internal processes and efficiency.
Collaborating with the CX team to create user experiences implies understanding user needs and business goals related to customer experience.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating closely with our CX team, to create well crafted experiences for our users.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge' and specifically 'using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)' indicates the application of AI, but in a user/developer productivity enhancement context rather than core AI model development.
job_tasks.phrase: Using the emerging possibilities of AI to enhance your work and knowledge.

job_tasks.justification: The example of 'using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)' describes the application of AI for task automation and skill acquisition, which falls under using AI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: using generative AI to learn a new skill, or do the brunt of tedious, straightforward work (such as test writing)

job_tasks.justification: Taking an active role in an Agile process is a business/team process understanding requirement.
job_tasks.phrase: Take an active role in our Agile process

job_tasks.justification: Elevating the skills and knowledge of team members directly relates to continuous learning and knowledge sharing within a team.
job_tasks.phrase: Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members

job_tasks.justification: Active participation in shaping technical directions and implementations with CTO and CPO demonstrates involvement in strategic business and technical decision-making.
job_tasks.phrase: Active participation in shaping the future of development within Faqta by brainstorming with the CTO and CPO on technical directions and implementations.

soft_skills.phrase: desire to create a positive transformative impact on education
collaborating closely with our UX researcher, as well as your fellow developers.
Collaborating closely with our CX team
Elevating the skills and knowledge of your team members
Active participation in shaping the future of development
